summary: Two siblings find out about a mythical aquatic monster and try to a save a remote Canadian lake from being used as a dump site for toxic waste.
cast: Mark Harmon|Joshua Jackson|Harley Jane Kozak|Sarah Wayne|Willie Nark-Orn|Frank Salsedo|Morris Panych|Ben Cardinal|Adrien Dorval|Mark Acheson|Anthony Towe|John Procaccino|Tom Cavanagh|Garrett Bennett|Brian T. Finney|David Rasche|Tamsin Kelsey|Benjamin Ratner|Lesley Ewen|Will Sasso|Teryl Rothery|Norma Jean Wick|Nathan Begg|Phillip Baer|Peter Baer|Elise Wayne|Cole Halleran|Shane Meier
title: Magia en el agua
